Class pyglet.text.DocumentDecoder

Known Subclasses:
formats.structured.StructuredTextDecoder, formats.plaintext.PlainTextDecoder, formats.attributed.AttributedTextDecoder
Abstract document decoder.

Methods

AbstractDocument decode(self, text, location=None)
Decode document text.

Method Details

decode

decode(self, text, location=None)
Decode document text.
Parameters:
text : str
Text to decode
location : Location
Location to use as base path for additional resources referenced within the document (for example, HTML images).
Returns: AbstractDocument
